verbs.description: if tony stewart runs in indy 500 again he [V: wo] n't be a ideshow like danica patrick if tony stewart runs in another indianapolis 500 he does n't want to follow the path of danica patrick patrick made more of a token appearance in indycar signature event last may crashing and finishing 30th in the final professional race of her career tony stewart danica patrick
